name: BreadMaker
0:
”Alexa,ask bread maker.”
”Alexa,ask bread maker to start the device.”
”Alexa,ask bread maker to stop the device.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bread maker
des:
You can use the BreadMaker skill to control the bread maker michine with Alexa echo.First,you need to signed up an account with BreadMaker APP. Then, bounding your account when you enable this skill.

After that, you can say:
"Alexa,ask BreadMaker to Start/Stop/Pause devicename” to start/Stop/Pause to make a bread.

The bread maker has more than 17 modes,every mode represent a kind of bread. Such as Soft bread,Sweet bread, Natural fermented bread and French bread.So you can say :
"Alexa,ask BreadMaker to set devicename to mode 1~17” to set the mode of device. 

You can set a clock for BreadMaker by saying:
"Alexa,ask BreadMaker to Start/Stop/Pause set devicename clock at xx o'clock”

There are three weight(500g/750g/1000g) you can choose to set,saying:
"Alexa,ask BreadMaker to set devicename weight to 500/750 /1000 gramme”

You can also set the color(light/medium/Dark) of bread by saying:
"Alexa,ask BreadMaker to set devicename color to light/medium/Dark"
